OCC:: then blast my last and I'm post this tha will have more sence.

::Windlord::

Windlord was flying fastest than he had flown in all his life
"A wrong movement..." thought the hawk while he mantains his 
speed "and this lady and me will be in the Matrix"

He increased his speed every time more.
 
"Here's Windlord to Cybertron fire... Do you copy?" said the hwak 
while the battle for surviving was continued 

He used the enemies' shot to destroy the missiles  and he continued 
moved tryin to avoid the shots of Darkone and Sixshot 

"I claimed sactury for a hurted femme" said Windlord "I'll arrive 
soon... just be ready and don't shoot me..."
 
 

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> (Cybertronian Fire is in South Africa, in a huge, flat plain)
> 
> 
> Dark One/Sixshot/Chordate:
> 
> 
> 
> Dark One pulled to the side of two of Teltoli's shots, returning 
fire with 
> twenty rapid laser blasts at Teltoli.
> 
> Sixshot fired off twenty-five rapid laser blasts at Windlord.
> 
> ---
> 
> Chordate uploaded the signature and added it to the database.
> "Received, but there's still no guarantee you'll be safe.  Their 
might be an 
> outside group other than the Alliance attacking us."
